text: Has the adjoint/ChainRules rule for a 2D (more generally n-D) array comprehension been implemented for Zygote?

elements.text: Has the adjoint/ChainRules rule for a 2D (more generally n-D) array comprehension been implemented for Zygote?

text:
Why do you ask?
Zygote can AD array comprehensions, if that is your question.
